system.description: The character is exceptionally skilled at using chain weapons, maximizing the devastating rending power of their spinning teeth.
system.benefit: When character uses a chain weapon with the Tearing Quality, they roll two additional dice for damage and discard the lowest two (as opposed to Tearing's normal one extra die).

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Tearing
specialAbilities.description: When using a chain weapon with the Tearing Quality, roll two additional dice for damage and discard the lowest two (instead of the normal Tearing rule of one extra die).
